title: Information Retrieval Basics
body: Information retrieval (IR) is about finding material of an unstructured nature that satisfies an information need.

title: Machine Learning Overview
body: Machine learning enables systems to learn and improve from experience without being explicitly programmed.

title: Deep Learning Techniques
body: Deep learning is a subset of machine learning involving neural networks with representation learning.

title: Applications of Neural Networks
body: Neural networks are used in image recognition, speech processing, and medical diagnosis.
